[禹]
The Shuowen interprets the character as pictographic ( 象形 ) of an animal. The bronze-script character clearly shows the 虫 component.

[䖝]
recorded in one or more historical dictionaries as a variant form of 虺

[虺]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *hŋuːl, *hŋruːl, *hŋlulʔ ): phonetic 兀 ( OC *ŋuːd ) + semantic 虫 .
